verses.verse: Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5020><s%> the king, <S%H4430><s%> to all <S%H3606><s%> people, <S%H5972><s%> nations, <S%H524><s%> and languages, <S%H3961><s%> that dwell <S%H1753><s%> in all <S%H3606><s%> the earth; <S%H772><s%> Peace <S%H8001><s%> be multiplied <S%H7680><s%> to you.

I thought <S%H8232><s%> <S%H6925><s%> it good <S%H8232><s%> to show <S%H2324><s%> the signs <S%H852><s%> and wonders <S%H8540><s%> that the high <S%H5943><s%> God <S%H426><s%> has worked <S%H5648><s%> toward <S%H5974><s%> me.

How <S%H4101><s%> great <S%H7260><s%> are his signs! <S%H852><s%> and how <S%H4101><s%> mighty <S%H8624><s%> are his wonders! <S%H8540><s%> his kingdom <S%H4437><s%> is an everlasting <S%H5957><s%> kingdom, <S%H4437><s%> and his dominion <S%H7985><s%> is from generation <S%H1859><s%> to generation. <S%H1859><s%>
I Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5020><s%> was at rest <S%H7954><s%> in my house, <S%H1005><s%> and flourishing <S%H7487><s%> in my palace: <S%H1965><s%>

I saw <S%H2370><s%> a dream <S%H2493><s%> which made me afraid, <S%H1763><s%> and the thoughts <S%H2031><s%> on my bed <S%H4903><s%> and the visions <S%H2376><s%> of my head <S%H7217><s%> troubled <S%H927><s%> me.

Therefore made <S%H7761><s%> I a decree <S%H2942><s%> to bring <S%H5924><s%> in all <S%H3606><s%> the wise <S%H2445><s%> men of Babylon <S%H895><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> me, that they might make known <S%H3046><s%> to me the interpretation <S%H6591><s%> of the dream. <S%H2493><s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> came <S%H5954><s%> in the magicians, <S%H2749><s%> the astrologers, <S%H826><s%> the Chaldeans, <S%H3779><s%> and the soothsayers: <S%H1505><s%> and I told <S%H560><s%> the dream <S%H2493><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> them; but they did not make known <S%H3046><s%> to me the interpretation <S%H6591><s%> thereof.

But at <S%H5705><s%> the last <S%H318><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> came <S%H5954><s%> in before <S%H5922><s%> <S%H6925><s%> me, whose <S%H1768><s%> name <S%H8036><s%> was Belteshazzar, <S%H1096><s%> according to the name <S%H8036><s%> of my God, <S%H426><s%> and in whom <S%H1768><s%> is the spirit <S%H7308><s%> of the holy <S%H6922><s%> gods: <S%H426><s%> and before <S%H6925><s%> him I told <S%H560><s%> the dream, <S%H2493><s%> saying,

O Belteshazzar, <S%H1096><s%> master <S%H7229><s%> of the magicians, <S%H2749><s%> because <S%H1768><s%> I know <S%H3046><s%> that the spirit <S%H7308><s%> of the holy <S%H6922><s%> gods <S%H426><s%> is in you, and no <S%H3606><s%> <S%H3809><s%> secret <S%H7328><s%> troubles <S%H598><s%> you, tell <S%H560><s%> me the visions <S%H2376><s%> of my dream <S%H2493><s%> that I have seen, <S%H2370><s%> and the interpretation <S%H6591><s%> thereof.

Thus were the visions <S%H2376><s%> of my head <S%H7217><s%> in my bed; <S%H4903><s%> I saw, <S%H2370><s%> and behold <S%H431><s%>a tree <S%H363><s%> in the middle <S%H1459><s%> of the earth, <S%H772><s%> and the height <S%H7314><s%> thereof was great. <S%H7690><s%>

The tree <S%H363><s%> grew, <S%H7236><s%> and was strong, <S%H8631><s%> and the height <S%H7314><s%> thereof reached <S%H4291><s%> to heaven, <S%H8065><s%> and the sight <S%H2379><s%> thereof to the end <S%H5491><s%> of all <S%H3606><s%> the earth: <S%H772><s%>

The leaves <S%H6074><s%> thereof were fair, <S%H8209><s%> and the fruit <S%H4><s%> thereof much, <S%H7690><s%> and in it was meat <S%H4203><s%> for all: <S%H3606><s%> the beasts <S%H2423><s%> of the field <S%H1251><s%> had shadow <S%H2927><s%> under <S%H8460><s%> it, and the fowls <S%H6853><s%> of the heaven <S%H8065><s%> dwelled <S%H1753><s%> in the boughs <S%H6056><s%> thereof, and all <S%H3606><s%> flesh <S%H1321><s%> was fed <S%H2110><s%> of it.

I saw <S%H2370><s%> in the visions <S%H2376><s%> of my head <S%H7217><s%> on my bed, <S%H4903><s%> and, behold, <S%H431><s%> a watcher <S%H5894><s%> and an holy <S%H6922><s%> one came <S%H5182><s%> down <S%H5182><s%> from heaven; <S%H8065><s%>

He cried <S%H7123><s%> aloud, <S%H2429><s%> and said <S%H560><s%> thus, <S%H3652><s%> Hew <S%H1414><s%> down the tree, <S%H363><s%> and cut <S%H7113><s%> off his branches, <S%H6056><s%> shake <S%H5426><s%> off his leaves, <S%H6074><s%> and scatter <S%H921><s%> his fruit: <S%H4><s%> let the beasts <S%H2423><s%> get <S%H5111><s%> away <S%H5111><s%> from under <S%H8478><s%> it, and the fowls <S%H6853><s%> from his branches: <S%H6056><s%>

Nevertheless <S%H1297><s%> leave <S%H7662><s%> the stump <S%H6136><s%> of his roots <S%H8330><s%> in the earth, <S%H772><s%> even with a band <S%H613><s%> of iron <S%H6523><s%> and brass, <S%H5174><s%> in the tender grass <S%H1883><s%> of the field; <S%H1251><s%> and let it be wet <S%H6647><s%> with the dew <S%H2920><s%> of heaven, <S%H8065><s%> and let his portion <S%H2508><s%> be with the beasts <S%H2423><s%> in the grass <S%H6211><s%> of the earth: <S%H772><s%>

Let his heart <S%H3825><s%> be changed <S%H8133><s%> from man's, <S%H606><s%> and let a beast's <S%H2423><s%> heart <S%H3825><s%> be given <S%H3052><s%> to him; and let seven <S%H7655><s%> times <S%H5732><s%> pass <S%H2499><s%> over <S%H5922><s%> him.

This matter <S%H6600><s%> is by the decree <S%H1510><s%> of the watchers, <S%H5894><s%> and the demand <S%H7595><s%> by the word <S%H3983><s%> of the holy <S%H6922><s%> ones: to the intent <S%H1701><s%> that the living <S%H2417><s%> may know <S%H3046><s%> that the most <S%H5943><s%> High <S%H5943><s%> rules <S%H7980><s%> in the kingdom <S%H4437><s%> of men, <S%H606><s%> and gives <S%H5415><s%> it to whomsoever <S%H4479><s%> he will, <S%H6634><s%> and sets <S%H6966><s%> up over <S%H5922><s%> it the basest <S%H8215><s%> of men. <S%H606><s%>

This <S%H1836><s%> dream <S%H2493><s%> I king <S%H4430><s%> Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5020><s%> have seen. <S%H2370><s%> Now you, O Belteshazzar, <S%H1096><s%> declare <S%H560><s%> the interpretation <S%H6591><s%> thereof, for as much <S%H3606><s%> as all <S%H3606><s%> the wise <S%H2445><s%> men of my kingdom <S%H4437><s%> are not able <S%H3202><s%> to make known <S%H3046><s%> to me the interpretation: <S%H6591><s%> but you are able; <S%H3546><s%> for the spirit <S%H7308><s%> of the holy <S%H6922><s%> gods <S%H426><s%> is in you.

Then <S%H116><s%> Daniel, <S%H1841><s%> whose <S%H1768><s%> name <S%H8036><s%> was Belteshazzar, <S%H1096><s%> was astonished <S%H8075><s%> for one <S%H2298><s%> hour, <S%H8160><s%> and his thoughts <S%H7476><s%> troubled <S%H927><s%> him. The king <S%H4430><s%> spoke, <S%H6032><s%> and said, <S%H560><s%> Belteshazzar, <S%H1096><s%> let not the dream, <S%H2493><s%> or the interpretation <S%H6591><s%> thereof, trouble <S%H927><s%> you. Belteshazzar <S%H1096><s%> answered <S%H6032><s%> and said, <S%H560><s%> My lord, <S%H4756><s%> the dream <S%H2493><s%> be to them that hate <S%H8131><s%> you, and the interpretation <S%H6591><s%> thereof to your enemies. <S%H6146><s%>

The tree <S%H363><s%> that you saw, <S%H2370><s%> which <S%H1768><s%> grew, <S%H7236><s%> and was strong, <S%H8631><s%> whose height <S%H7314><s%> reached <S%H4291><s%> to the heaven, <S%H8065><s%> and the sight <S%H2379><s%> thereof to all <S%H3606><s%> the earth; <S%H772><s%>

Whose leaves <S%H6074><s%> were fair, <S%H8209><s%> and the fruit <S%H4><s%> thereof much, <S%H7690><s%> and in it was meat <S%H4203><s%> for all; <S%H3606><s%> under <S%H8460><s%> which the beasts <S%H2423><s%> of the field <S%H1251><s%> dwelled, <S%H1753><s%> and on whose branches <S%H6056><s%> the fowls <S%H6853><s%> of the heaven <S%H8065><s%> had their habitation: <S%H7932><s%>

It is you, O king, <S%H4430><s%> that are grown <S%H7236><s%> and become <S%H8631><s%> strong: <S%H8631><s%> for your greatness <S%H7238><s%> is grown, <S%H7236><s%> and reaches <S%H4291><s%> to heaven, <S%H8065><s%> and your dominion <S%H7985><s%> to the end <S%H5491><s%> of the earth. <S%H772><s%>

And whereas <S%H1768><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%> saw <S%H2370><s%> a watcher <S%H5894><s%> and an holy <S%H6922><s%> one coming <S%H5182><s%> down <S%H5182><s%> from heaven, <S%H8065><s%> and saying, <S%H560><s%> Hew <S%H1414><s%> the tree <S%H363><s%> down, and destroy <S%H2255><s%> it; yet <S%H1297><s%> leave <S%H7662><s%> the stump <S%H6136><s%> of the roots <S%H8330><s%> thereof in the earth, <S%H772><s%> even with a band <S%H613><s%> of iron <S%H6523><s%> and brass, <S%H5174><s%> in the tender grass <S%H1883><s%> of the field; <S%H1251><s%> and let it be wet <S%H6647><s%> with the dew <S%H2920><s%> of heaven, <S%H8065><s%> and let his portion <S%H2508><s%> be with the beasts <S%H2423><s%> of the field, <S%H1251><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> seven <S%H7655><s%> times <S%H5732><s%> pass <S%H2499><s%> over <S%H5922><s%> him;

This <S%H1836><s%> is the interpretation, <S%H6591><s%> O king, <S%H4430><s%> and this <S%H1931><s%> is the decree <S%H1510><s%> of the most <S%H5943><s%> High, <S%H5943><s%> which <S%H1768><s%> is come <S%H4291><s%> on my lord <S%H4756><s%> the king: <S%H4430><s%>

That they shall drive <S%H2957><s%> you from men, <S%H606><s%> and your dwelling <S%H4070><s%> shall be with the beasts <S%H2423><s%> of the field, <S%H1251><s%> and they shall make you to eat <S%H2939><s%> grass <S%H6211><s%> as oxen, <S%H8450><s%> and they shall wet <S%H6647><s%> you with the dew <S%H2920><s%> of heaven, <S%H8065><s%> and seven <S%H7655><s%> times <S%H5732><s%> shall pass <S%H2499><s%> over <S%H5922><s%> you, till <S%H5704><s%> you know <S%H3046><s%> that the most <S%H5943><s%> High <S%H5943><s%> rules <S%H7980><s%> in the kingdom <S%H4437><s%> of men, <S%H606><s%> and gives <S%H5415><s%> it to whomsoever <S%H4479><s%> he will. <S%H6634><s%>

And whereas <S%H1768><s%> they commanded <S%H560><s%> to leave <S%H7662><s%> the stump <S%H6136><s%> of the tree <S%H363><s%> roots; <S%H8330><s%> your kingdom <S%H4437><s%> shall be sure <S%H7011><s%> to you, after <S%H1767><s%> that you shall have known <S%H3046><s%> that the heavens <S%H8065><s%> do rule. <S%H7990><s%>

Why, <S%H3861><s%> O king, <S%H4430><s%> let my counsel <S%H4431><s%> be acceptable <S%H8232><s%> to you, and break <S%H6562><s%> off your sins <S%H2408><s%> by righteousness, <S%H6665><s%> and your iniquities <S%H5758><s%> by showing mercy <S%H2604><s%> to the poor; <S%H6033><s%> if <S%H2006><s%> it may be a lengthening <S%H754><s%> of your tranquility. <S%H7963><s%>
All <S%H3606><s%> this came <S%H4291><s%> on the king <S%H4430><s%> Nebuchadnezzar. <S%H5020><s%>
At the end <S%H7118><s%> of twelve <S%H8648><s%> <S%H6236><s%> months <S%H3393><s%> he walked <S%H1981><s%> in the palace <S%H1965><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4437><s%> of Babylon. <S%H895><s%>

The king <S%H4430><s%> spoke, <S%H6032><s%> and said, <S%H560><s%> Is not this <S%H1668><s%> great <S%H7227><s%> Babylon, <S%H895><s%> that I have built <S%H1124><s%> for the house <S%H1005><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4437><s%> by the might <S%H8632><s%> of my power, <S%H2632><s%> and for the honor <S%H3367><s%> of my majesty? <S%H1923><s%>

While <S%H5751><s%> the word <S%H4406><s%> was in the king's <S%H4430><s%> mouth, <S%H6433><s%> there fell <S%H5308><s%> a voice <S%H7032><s%> from heaven, <S%H8065><s%> saying, O king <S%H4430><s%> Nebuchadnezzar, <S%H5020><s%> to you it is spoken; <S%H560><s%> The kingdom <S%H4437><s%> is departed <S%H5709><s%> from you.

And they shall drive <S%H2957><s%> you from men, <S%H606><s%> and your dwelling <S%H4070><s%> shall be with the beasts <S%H2423><s%> of the field: <S%H1251><s%> they shall make you to eat <S%H2939><s%> grass <S%H6211><s%> as oxen, <S%H8450><s%> and seven <S%H7655><s%> times <S%H5732><s%> shall pass <S%H2499><s%> over <S%H5922><s%> you, until <S%H5704><s%> you know <S%H3046><s%> that the most <S%H5943><s%> High <S%H5943><s%> rules <S%H7980><s%> in the kingdom <S%H4437><s%> of men, <S%H606><s%> and gives <S%H5415><s%> it to whomsoever <S%H4479><s%> he will. <S%H6634><s%>

The same hour <S%H8160><s%> was the thing <S%H4406><s%> fulfilled <S%H5487><s%> on Nebuchadnezzar: <S%H5020><s%> and he was driven <S%H2957><s%> from men, <S%H606><s%> and did eat <S%H399><s%> grass <S%H6211><s%> as oxen, <S%H8450><s%> and his body <S%H1655><s%> was wet <S%H6647><s%> with the dew <S%H2920><s%> of heaven, <S%H8065><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> his hairs <S%H8177><s%> were grown <S%H7236><s%> like eagles' <S%H5403><s%> feathers, and his nails <S%H2953><s%> like birds' <S%H6853><s%> claws.

And at the end <S%H7118><s%> of the days <S%H3118><s%> I Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5020><s%> lifted <S%H5191><s%> up my eyes <S%H5870><s%> to heaven, <S%H8065><s%> and my understanding <S%H4486><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to me, and I blessed <S%H1289><s%> the most <S%H5943><s%> High, <S%H5943><s%> and I praised <S%H7624><s%> and honored <S%H1922><s%> him that lives <S%H2416><s%> for ever, <S%H5957><s%> whose <S%H1768><s%> dominion <S%H7985><s%> is an everlasting <S%H5957><s%> dominion, <S%H7985><s%> and his kingdom <S%H4437><s%> is from generation <S%H1859><s%> to generation: <S%H1859><s%>

And all <S%H3606><s%> the inhabitants <S%H1753><s%> of the earth <S%H772><s%> are reputed <S%H2804><s%> as nothing: <S%H3809><s%> and he does <S%H5648><s%> according to his will <S%H6634><s%> in the army <S%H2429><s%> of heaven, <S%H8065><s%> and among the inhabitants <S%H1753><s%> of the earth: <S%H772><s%> and none <S%H3809><s%> can stay <S%H4223><s%> his hand, <S%H3028><s%> or say <S%H560><s%> to him, What <S%H4101><s%> do <S%H5648><s%> you?

At the same time <S%H2166><s%> my reason <S%H4486><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to me; and for the glory <S%H3367><s%> of my kingdom, <S%H4437><s%> my honor <S%H1923><s%> and brightness <S%H2122><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to me; and my counsellors <S%H1907><s%> and my lords <S%H7261><s%> sought <S%H1158><s%> to me; and I was established <S%H8627><s%> in my kingdom, <S%H4437><s%> and excellent <S%H3493><s%> majesty <S%H7238><s%> was added <S%H3255><s%> to me.

Now <S%H3705><s%> I Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5020><s%> praise <S%H7624><s%> and extol <S%H7313><s%> and honor <S%H1922><s%> the King <S%H4430><s%> of heaven, <S%H8065><s%> all <S%H3606><s%> whose <S%H1768><s%> works <S%H4567><s%> are truth, <S%H7187><s%> and his ways <S%H735><s%> judgment: <S%H1780><s%> and those <S%H1768><s%> that walk <S%H1981><s%> in pride <S%H1466><s%> he is able <S%H3202><s%> to abase. <S%H8214><s%>
